pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.3: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā āvasatho ḍayhati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.8: Yaṃ kiñci naṭṭhaṃ sabbaṃ amhe abhiyuñjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.9: Thullanandā bhikkhunī punadeva taṃ āvasathaṃ paccāgantvā bhikkhuniyo pucchi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:6.13: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo āvasathe ḍayhamāne bhaṇḍakaṃ na nīharissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkamissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī āvasathaṃ anissajjitvā cārikaṃ pakkameyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:11.2: bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇeriyā vā anissajjitvā parikkhittassa āvasathassa parikkhepaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc48:11.3: Aparikkhittassa āvasathassa upacāraṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti pācittiyassa.
